bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, internal cable routing,  threaded BB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon full monocoque w/ Zertz inserts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings w/ 20mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Specialized Pro-Set, 3D forged 7050 aluminum, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Specialized Pro Gel with neoprene pads
Shimano Ultegra STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Ultegra STI, flight deck compatible
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
Specialized Roubaix Pro II, 700x23/25c, aramid bead, 120TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Specialized Roubaix Pro II, 700x23/25c, aramid bead, 120TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Body Geometry Avatar Comp w/ hollow Cr-Mo rails
Specialized Pro, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
